effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
flavor_text.platinum: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def.
